segments.text: Good mastery . How do you like our Chinese food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great ! It's delicious . You see , I am already putting on weight . There is one thing I don't like however , MSG .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's wrong with MSG ? It helps to bring out the taste of the food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: According to some studies it may cause cancer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , don't let that worry you . If that were true , China wouldn't have such a large population .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just happen to have a question for you guys . Why do the Chinese cook the vegetables ? You see what I mean is that most vitamin are destroyed when heated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know exactly . It's a tradition . Maybe it's for sanitary reasons .
segments.speaker: S1
